Subject: Introduction
optional materials: Affine transformations (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F5WA26W4JaM), Perspective projections pt.1 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F5WA26W4JaM), Perspective projections pt.2 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7Pb8mrwcJ0)
Presentations: Introduction to Imaging and Computer Graphics ()

Subject: Foundation for Generative Models
optional materials: VAE (https://arxiv.org/abs/1312.6114), GAN (https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.2661), Normalizing flows (http://proceedings.mlr.press/v37/rezende15.pdf), diffusion models (https://arxiv.org/abs/2006.11239)

Subject: Transformers
materials: Attention is all you need (https://arxiv.org/abs/1706.03762), ViT (https://arxiv.org/abs/2010.11929)

Subject: Dense Reconstruction
optional materials: Phototourism (http://phototour.cs.washington.edu/Photo_Tourism.pdf), Shape and spatially-varying brdfs from photometric stereo (https://grail.cs.washington.edu/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/goldman-2005-sas.pdf)

Subject: Dynamic Reconstruction
optional materials: Monocular Dynamic View Synthesis: A Reality Check (https://arxiv.org/abs/2210.13445), Neural Jacobian Fields (https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.02904)

Subject: Motion Generation
materials: motion diffusion models (https://arxiv.org/abs/2209.14916), Synthesizing physical character-scene interactions (https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.00883)

Subject: Internal Learning
optional materials: Zero Shot Super-Resolution (https://arxiv.org/abs/1712.06087), Learn from A Single Image (https://arxiv.org/abs/1904.13132), SinGRAF (https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.17260)

Subject: Category and Pose
optional materials: Neural Congealing (https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.03956), Correspondence from Image Diffusion (https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.03881)

Subject: Parts and Wholes
materials: Detect What You Can (https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.2031), Attentional Constellation Nets (https://openreview.net/pdf?id=vujTf_I8Kmc)
optional materials: Semantic Understanding of Scenes (https://arxiv.org/abs/1608.05442),  Hedging Your Bets (https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/6248086)

Subject: Fine-grained Recognition
materials: Between-class Attribute Transfer (https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/5206594), Attributes as Operators (https://arxiv.org/abs/1803.09851)

Subject: Few-shot Learning
optional materials: Matching Net (https://arxiv.org/abs/1606.04080), Conditional Prompt Learning for Vision-Language Models (https://arxiv.org/abs/2203.05557)

Subject: Continual Learning
materials: Overcoming Catastrophic Forgetting (https://arxiv.org/abs/1612.00796), Robust Fine-tuning of Zero-Shot Models (https://arxiv.org/abs/2109.01903)
optional materials: Variational Continual Learning (https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.10628), Gradient Projection Memory (https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.09762)
